pages.text: The $(l:tools/drone)Drone/$ will wait the specified amount of time, doing nothing. The time is specified by attaching a $(l:programming/text)Text/$ widget, and entering a duration.$(p)The following duration formats are accepted:$(li)$(thing)20/$: wait 1 second (20 ticks)$(li)$(thing)10s/$: wait 10 seconds$(li)$(thing)5m/$: wait 5 minutes
